akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2881. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519
Section, Pub. L. 88–452, title III, § 331, Aug. 20, 1964, 78 Stat. 525; Pub. L. 89–16, title III, § 303, Apr. 30, 1965, 79 Stat. 108; Pub. L. 89–253, § 24, Oct. 29, 1965, 79 Stat. 977; Pub. L. 89–794, title III, § 301(c), Nov. 8, 1966, 80 Stat. 1465, related to indemnity payments to farmers.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1981, see section 9912(a) of this title, prior to the general amendment of chapter 106 (§ 9901 et seq.) of this title by Pub. L. 105–285.
